Journey

Here is a quick summary of my journey in tech:

Mar 2025 - Present

Software Developer

  • Developed functionalities in the front-end layer in applications aimed at agribusiness, using technologies such as Vuejs, Javascript, Jquery, and Axios.
  • Designed and implemented scalable APIs and background workers for managing first- and third-party proprietary licenses using .net 6, PostgreSQL, and Azure cloud technologies that serve daily license requests.
  • I excel in extracting insights and knowledge from datasets. Using Python and pandas library to create data frames and Postgres to store all analyzed data.

Jan 2023 - Jan 2025

Software Developer

  • Engineered advanced front-end functionalities for aviation applications using Javascript, React, and Angular; improved user experience and performance, leading to a 40% increase in user engagement and satisfaction.
  • Designed and implemented scalable APIs and background workers for managing first- and third-party proprietary licenses using Java, PostgreSQL, Oracle, RabbitMQ, and Heroku cloud technologies that serve millions of license requests daily.
  • Infrastructure maintenance in the context of JBOSS typically entails managing and ensuring the stability and reliability of the JBOSS application server.
